attr.title: Sonic Colors Demastered
attr.desc: Sonic Colors Demastered is a 2D reimagining of Sonic Colors for the Nintendo Wii and Nintendo DS. The game features gameplay inspired by the Sonic Rush series and fully original level design. The game also features a fully original soundtrack produced by Randomocity Remixes, KITSUN3POWR, Mr_Shoemonster, and David Johnson.
attr.inst: Download the game from itch.io: https://randomocity-gaming.itch.io/sonic-colors-demastered and unzip the files to `ports/soniccolorsdemastered/gamedata`.
